PublicVariables (GVL)
PublicVariables (GVL)
Â¶
This GVL is called from the visualization libraries and it registers therein. Therefore
it is initialized in visualization context. In fact this initialization together
with the visualization fixes a problem that the library did not work anymore after
onlinechanges.
